about_the_game:
A back alley that became the setting for Hong Kong noir in the 1980s



Genre : Topdown Shooter

I came here to keep my loyalty with my brothers and to seek revenge.

Hongkong Noir is set in the dark backstreets of Hong Kong, where players fight as members of the Hong Kong mafia against evil forces trying to rule the city. This game is once the player dies, they have to start all over again.
The game captures the noir atmosphere of Hong Kong and offers immersive gameplay.

It is a game that can be played in a short amount of time, provides a leaderboard, and is a game that can be continuously challenged.

If you enter the YouTube link, you can use the music of the noir genre you want to hear as the background music for the game.

It is a game where you move with the keyboard and shoot with the mouse.
